fields.description:
While testing KS Views I noticed unexpected text's size change on rotation from a landscape mode to portrait. Zooming a Web View before rotation is not affecting text size. It appears when a test case run from a landscape mode only.

This is not a regression. The issue occurs on 2.0.2.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Run Base UI - Views - Web Views - Inline HTML in a landscape mode.
3. Rotate the device.

Expected result:
No text's size change on rotation

Actual result:
Text size changes
fields.summary: Android: Views - Default Web View changes Text size  on rotation.
